title: XYplorer Pro v16.30.0000
description:
XYplorer Pro v16.30.0000



Whatâ€™s New in 16.30?

released 23-Feb-2016

    Color Histogram. The Floating Preview now sports an optional color histogram. Lets you check out your photos' color channels in a blink.
    Thumbs Gallery. Now it's easy to quickly toggle between normal thumbnails and a hardcore gallery mode without captions, padding, or white space. The classic wall of pictures. 



XYplorer is a file manager for Windows. It features tabbed browsing, a powerful file search, a versatile preview, a highly customizable interface, optional dual pane, and a large array of unique ways to efficiently automate frequently recurring tasks. Itâ€™s fast and light, itâ€™s innovative, and itâ€™s portable.

XYplorer with Tabs, Mini Tree, Tree Path Tracing, Breadcrumb Bar, and Tags and Comments. Floating Preview to the right, with Photo Data.

Itâ€™s Portable

XYplorer is a portable file manager. It doesnâ€™t require any installation, stores all configuration data in the application data folder, and running it doesnâ€™t change your system or registry. Take it with you and start it from a USB stick. File management to go.
Itâ€™s Tabbed

Tabs let you switch between folders most easily. Drag them around, hide them, lock them, name them, or drop files onto them. The tabs remember their configuration individually and across sessions. On top of this you get tabsets and dual pane.
Itâ€™s Functional

XYplorer has been designed to make you faster. Numerous usability enhancements in an attractive interface help to streamline your workflow and increase your efficiency. You will definitely save a lot of time.
Itâ€™s Scriptable

Yes, you can program this app. Individual solutions for individual tasks. No plugins needed, scripts run out-of-the-box. Even beginners can benefit from this feature since many ready-to-use scripts are available in the forum.
Itâ€™s Customizable

You can fine-tune the app to look and behave exactly as you want it. This ranges from fonts and colors to custom toolbar buttons and even file icons and program associations. And every bit of it is fully portable.
Itâ€™s Responsive

Your customer voice is listened to and taken seriously, most of the time you get instant feedback, and your wish might actually get implemented sooner than youâ€™d think
